cast.name: 奈吉尔·莱斯格 Nigel Lythgoe

this_title: So You Think You Can Dance Season 13
trans_title: 舞魅天下 第十三季
introduction: FOX has renewed the Emmy Award-winning SO YOU THINK YOU CAN DANCE (SYTYCD) for a 13th season that will feature a younger generation of dancers. This season, dancers between the ages of 8-13, who are skilled in various dance styles, such as contemporary, tap, hip-hop, ballroom, animation or breaking, will be paired up with All-Stars to compete for the title of America’s Favorite...
chinese_title: 舞魅天下 第十三季
foreign_title: So You Think You Can Dance Season 13
